channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large dangerous pothole, 3rd February
item.description:
Pothole has been here for weeks and still not repaired. Tonight I hit this In the dark and my tyre burst. Will be making a claim from the council as you can see a number of previous reports on this website and it has not been repaired
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping various back lane between Hanover St & Brunswick Street, 2nd February
item.description:
Lot of flytipping on the lane between Hanover St and Brunswick Street, Dunalley Parade end, near 23 Dunalley Parade. Items include sidewaste, fridge, roadworks sign, hardboard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Dunalley Parade, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large potholes Hanover Street, 2nd February
item.description:
2 large potholes in road opposite 50 Hanover Street. Both good depth and at least 40 cm wide. This road needs resurfacing not just patching

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 35 Hanover Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large deep pothole away from the kerb, 2nd February
item.description:
Deep pothole in line of cycle and car tyres ///forwarded.rumbles.regulate

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Tredington Park, Tredington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in line of tyre route, 2nd February
item.description:
This is a very deep pothole, right where the wheels go, it is likely to remount a cyclist or motorcyclist.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Tredington Park, Tredington

item.title: Potholes, 2nd February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hatherley Lodge Down Hatherley Lane, Down Hatherley

item.title: Drains and soil on road, 2nd February
item.description:
The drain is blocked and water is flowing down Dog Lane. In addition the water close to the field gate is bubbling up through the tarmac. There is a pothole developing in this location. There is also a lot of soil on the road about 1m in from the kerb

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large deep pothole close to pavement, 2nd February
item.description:
This pot hole has been here for a few months. It is large & very deep, it is on the outside of a bend so cars have to go over it & cannot avoid it. It will be causing damage to cars but is a danger to anyone on the pavement as stones are kicked up onto the pavement by cars traveling over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Chelmsford Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Bed, 2nd February
item.description:
This bed has been dumped in this country Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4213, Deerhurst
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sofa flytipped in the carpark behind 3 grenadier close, abbeymead, GL4 5GX, 1st February
item.description:
Sofa has been flytipped here over the last day or so. It has not been dumped by any of the house owners in the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Discovery Road, Abbeymead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked gutter drains, 1st February
item.description:
Two gutter drains on southside of A40, either side of ingress to Woodgate Close, Charlton Kings, GL52 6UW, choked full with silt causing vehicles to splash pedestrians. Gulley machine required to clear them, please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Woodgate Close, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 1st February
item.description:
New potholes formed in turn right box at BP garage on A40, and just east of same with 2 holes forming next to previously repaired site north side of bollarded crossing point next to Detmore Close..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): London Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 or 3 potholes in middle of road, 1st February
item.description:
2 or 3 potholes here in middle of road directly opp junction, quite deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Carlton Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole on Orchard Way near Russet Road., 1st February
item.description:
Huge pot hole.. causing damage to tyres.. there’s more potholes on Orchard way between Russet Road and the Umbrella pub.. even the speed bumps have pot holes!! Also fills with rain water and when a car drives over it, it’s kicking massive amount of stones on to the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 58 Orchard Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep potholes, 1st February
item.description:
Two potholes on junction of The Bank & Mill Street Prestbury. Poor original repair.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coulter Cottage Mill Street, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many thanks for streetlamp, 1st February
item.description:
Just to say thank you for responding quickly to my report of a leaning lamppost, & its replacement, much appreciated
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Campden Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
